item.title: 关税风暴来袭，铁矿石开采商开局不顺
item.description: 全球最大的铁矿石开采商在极端天气影响生产之后，面临着艰难的开局，而他们最大的客户中国也在为贸易战做准备。【原文：The world’s biggest iron ore miners face a difficult start to the year, after extreme weather impacted production and as their biggest customer China braces for a trade war.】

item.title: IDFC 第一银行将从华平投资和 ADIA 募集 8.77 亿美元资金
item.description: IDFC First Bank Ltd 批准了一项从 Warburg Pincus LLC 和阿布扎比投资局融资 750 亿卢比（8.77 亿美元）的计划。【原文：IDFC First Bank Ltd has approved a plan to raise 75 billion rupees ($877 million) from Warburg Pincus LLC and Abu Dhabi Investment Authority.】

item.title: 阿布扎比塔卡公司收购英国电力传输公司
item.description: 阿布扎比主要电力公司同意收购英国输电投资公司（Transmission Investment），该公司是将海上风电场连接到英国电网的最大资产运营商之一。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main power utility agreed to buy the UK’s Transmission Investment, one of the largest operators of assets connecting wind farms at sea to the British electricity grid.】

item.title: 美国关税引发比特币挖矿设备抢滩亚洲市场
item.description: 在大约一周的时间里，东南亚的比特币矿业公司面临着一个令人窒息的最后期限：4 月 9 日午夜。【原文：For about a week, Bitcoin mining firms in Southeast Asia faced an all-consuming deadline: midnight, April 9.】

item.title: 关税阻碍经济增长，欧洲央行将再次降息：决策指南
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税震动市场并使经济前景暗淡之后，欧洲中央银行即将第七次降息。【原文：The European Central Bank is about to cut interest rates for the seventh time after US President Donald Trump’s tariffs shook markets and darkened the economic outlook.】

item.title: 这是波兰的埃隆-马斯克吗？亿万富翁向繁文缛节宣战
item.description: 就在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）推动提高美国政府效率的同时，波兰总理也向一位彻底改变了欧洲物流业的当地亿万富翁求助，希望他领导波兰放松管制。【原文：Just as Elon Musk launched his push to boost US government efficiency, Poland’s prime minister turned to a local billionaire who revolutionized European logistics to lead his country’s deregulation drive.】

item.title: 特朗普的严厉关税引发莱索托对流动性危机的担忧
item.description: 莱索托贸易部长警告说，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普实施对来自这个南部非洲山区小国的进口商品征收 50%关税的计划，莱索托将面临流动性危机的风险。【原文：Lesotho is at risk of a liquidity crisis if US President Donald Trump follows through on plans to impose a 50% levy on imports from the tiny southern African mountain kingdom, its trade minister warned.】

item.title: 住友制药有望因干细胞研究成果而跃升
item.description: 一项研究结果表明，用于治疗帕金森病的干细胞具有安全性和潜在益处，住友制药株式会社（Sumitomo Pharma Co.【原文：Sumitomo Pharma Co. is set to rise by the daily limit in Tokyo after results of a study showed the safety and potential benefits of stem cells used to treat Parkinson’s disease.】

item.title: 高盛称中国股市面临 8000 亿美元美国资金外流风险
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US investors could be forced to offload around $800 billion of Chinese equities “in an extreme scenario” of financial decoupling between the world’s two largest economies, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. estimates.】

item.title: 台湾交易员十年来最大幅度降低股票杠杆率
item.description: 台湾的杠杆股票仓位连续第 19 个交易日下降，创下近 10 年来的最长连跌记录，凸显出在关税忧虑的影响下，当地投资者的风险偏好正在急剧转变。【原文：Leveraged equity positions in Taiwan fell for a 19th consecutive session, the longest streak in almost 10 years, underscoring how sharply local investors’ risk appetite is turning amid tariff concerns.】

item.title: 越南计划建设大型风能和太阳能发电场，到 2050 年停止使用煤炭
item.description: 越南政府批准了一项修订后的能源政策，要求大规模增加风能和太阳能发电能力，以满足不断增长的电力需求，同时在 2050 年前停止使用煤炭。【原文：Vietnam’s government has approved a revised energy policy that calls for massive increases in wind and solar capacity as it seeks to keep pace with growing power demand while ending the use of coal by 2050.】

item.title: 日本保险公司谋划如何在被颠覆的市场中调配数万亿资金
item.description: 据策略师称，日本的人寿保险公司在制定年度投资计划时将面临艰难的选择，因为他们要考虑到贸易战和不确定的货币政策前景所带来的风险。【原文：Japan’s life insurers will be faced with tough choices as they lay out their annual investment plans, mindful of the risks posed by the trade war and an uncertain monetary policy outlook, according to strategists.】

item.title: 日本央行中川赳夫强调央行监控关税的谨慎态度
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员中川顺子（Junko Nakagawa）在央行近期发出的政策制定者近期将避免加息的信号基础上，进一步强调了对经济和关税影响的谨慎态度。【原文：Bank of Japan Board Member Junko Nakagawa added to the central bank’s recent signals that policymakers will refrain from hiking interest rates in the near future, by flagging caution over the economy and tariff impacts.】

item.title: 亚洲煤炭价格因贸易战担忧跌至四年新低
item.description: 亚洲煤炭价格基准跌至四年来的最低点，原因是贸易紧张局势有可能削弱需求，考验着煤矿企业停产的水平。【原文：Asia’s coal price benchmark fell to a four-year low as trade tensions threaten to sap demand, testing levels where miners shut more production.】

item.title: 中国铝制造商称关税不会阻碍海外增长
item.description: 中国铝生产商正按计划扩大海外产能，并表示他们仍未受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普试图重新安排全球贸易秩序所带来的不确定性的影响。【原文：Chinese aluminum producers are on track to expand overseas capacity, saying they remain unfazed by the uncertainties caused by US President Donald Trump’s attempts to reorder global trade.】

item.title: 马来西亚航空公司在 2024 年仍能实现盈利
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司（Malaysia Airlines）在 2024 年报告了连续第二年的盈利，尽管去年下半年的维修紧缺和技术问题迫使该公司缩减了航班。【原文：Malaysia Airlines reported a second consecutive year of profit in 2024 despite a maintenance crunch and technical issues that forced it to scale down its flights in the second half of last year.】

item.title: 印度 ICICI 银行和 HDFC 银行面临经济放缓和利率下调问题
item.description: 印度是下周财报的主角，因为经济放缓对该国的银行和消费者都造成了压力。【原文：India dominates next week’s earnings calendar as a slowing economy weighs on the country’s banks and consumers alike.】

item.title: 据说数字桥公司出售东南亚塔楼的计划受阻
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，由于估值问题，DigitalBridge Group Inc.【原文：DigitalBridge Group Inc.’s plans to sell its Southeast Asian telecom tower operator are stalling amid valuation concerns, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人民币走软前景令印度卢比面临更多阻力
item.description: 印度卢比近期的涨势可能是短暂的，因为随着贸易对手中国放松对人民币的控制，印度卢比面临贬值压力。【原文：The Indian rupee’s recent gains may be short-lived, as depreciation pressure mounts on the currency with trade rival China loosening its grip on the yuan.】

item.title: 美国关税浪潮来袭前澳大利亚失业率攀升
item.description: 澳大利亚 3 月份的失业率略有上升，而就业人数的增幅低于预期，这表明在美国关税浪潮产生任何影响之前，劳动力市场已略有松动。【原文：Australia’s jobless rate edged up in March while employment increased less than expected, suggesting a slight loosening of the labor market even before any impact from a wave of US tariffs.】

item.title: 中国减少燃煤，经济为更多贸易动荡做准备
item.description: 随着经济的强劲增长和电力需求的不断增加，可再生能源的装机量也创下新高，中国的燃煤量正在减少。现在的问题是，气候友好型趋势能否抵御与美国贸易战的影响。【原文：China is burning less coal as stronger economic growth and rising power demand are met by record installations of renewables. The question now is whether the climate-friendly trend can withstand the impact of a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 在通胀加速和韩元波动之后，韩国央行维持利率稳定
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税运动引发市场震荡并给经济增长前景蒙上阴影，韩国消费者通胀意外回升，韩元汇率跌至 16 年低点，韩国央行维持基准利率稳定，以促进经济稳定。【原文：The Bank of Korea held its benchmark interest rate steady to foster stability after consumer inflation unexpectedly picked up and the won weakened to a 16-year-low as Donald Trump’s tariff campaign rattled markets and clouded the growth outlook.】

item.title: 美日开始正式关税谈判，但未讨论外汇问题
item.description: 日本最高谈判代表赤泽亮世说，美国和日本启动关税谈判的目的是尽快达成协议，但没有讨论货币问题。【原文：The US and Japan kicked off tariff negotiations with an aim to reach a deal as soon as possible but did not discuss currency issues, Japan’s top negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said.】

item.title: 特朗普开始加征关税，日本出口增速放缓
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税运动打响了第一炮，对钢铁和铝征收高额关税，开始扰乱商业活动，日本出口增长放缓。【原文：Japan’s exports rose at a slower pace as the first salvo of Donald Trump’s tariff campaign started disrupting commerce with the introduction of a high levy on steel and aluminum.】

item.title: 被特朗普盯上的前网络主管誓言对抗政府
item.description: 克里斯-克雷布斯（Chris Krebs）曾是美国网络安全和基础设施安全局局长，在特朗普政府剥夺了他和他的雇主的安全许可后，他发誓要与特朗普政府进行全职斗争。【原文：Chris Krebs, the onetime director of the US Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, is vowing to fight the Trump administration full-time after it stripped him and his employer of their security clearances.】

item.title: 贸易战愈演愈烈，亚洲债券曲线将进一步陡峭化
item.description: 亚洲债券曲线面临进一步陡峭化的风险，因为对宽松货币政策以缓和关税打击的押注拖累了短端收益率，而长期利率则追随国债收益率走高。【原文：Asian bond curves face the risk of steepening further as bets on monetary easing to soften the tariff blow drag down short-end yields, while long-term rates track Treasury yields higher.】

item.title: 续约申请失败后加纳接管金田公司矿山
item.description: 在西非国家拒绝了金田公司延长租约的申请后，加纳政府接管了金田公司达芒矿的控制权。【原文：The government of Ghana has assumed control of Gold Fields Ltd.’s Damang mine after the West African nation rejected an application to extend the company’s lease.】

item.title: 美国打压伊朗供应后石油连续第二天上涨
item.description: 在美国誓言将伊朗的能源出口降至零之后，石油连续第二天上涨。【原文：Oil rose for a second day after the US vowed to reduce Iran’s energy exports to zero.】
